properties.rdfs:comment: If the file can be downloaded, URL to download the binary.
properties.rdfs:label: downloadUrl

properties.rdfs:comment: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).
properties.rdfs:label: softwareRequirements

properties.rdfs:comment: Permission(s) required to run the app (for example, a mobile app may require full internet access or may run only on wifi).
properties.rdfs:label: permissions

properties.rdfs:comment: Processor architecture required to run the application (e.g. IA64).
properties.rdfs:label: processorRequirements

properties.rdfs:comment: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.
properties.rdfs:label: availableOnDevice

properties.rdfs:comment: Features or modules provided by this application (and possibly required by other applications).
properties.rdfs:label: featureList

properties.rdfs:comment: Subcategory of the application, e.g. 'Arcade Game'.
properties.rdfs:label: applicationSubCategory

properties.rdfs:comment: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.
properties.rdfs:label: device

properties.rdfs:comment: Type of software application, e.g. 'Game, Multimedia'.
properties.rdfs:label: applicationCategory

properties.rdfs:comment: Version of the software instance.
properties.rdfs:label: softwareVersion

properties.rdfs:comment: Storage requirements (free space required).
properties.rdfs:label: storageRequirements

properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the application suite to which the application belongs (e.g. Excel belongs to Office).
properties.rdfs:label: applicationSuite

properties.rdfs:comment: Minimum memory requirements.
properties.rdfs:label: memoryRequirements

properties.rdfs:comment: A link to a screenshot image of the app.
properties.rdfs:label: screenshot

properties.rdfs:comment: Countries for which the application is supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
properties.rdfs:label: countriesSupported

properties.rdfs:comment: Software application help.
properties.rdfs:label: softwareHelp

properties.rdfs:comment: Additional content for a software application.
properties.rdfs:label: softwareAddOn

properties.rdfs:comment: Description of what changed in this version.
properties.rdfs:label: releaseNotes

properties.rdfs:comment: Supporting data for a SoftwareApplication.
properties.rdfs:label: supportingData

properties.rdfs:comment: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).
properties.rdfs:label: requirements

properties.rdfs:comment: Countries for which the application is not supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
properties.rdfs:label: countriesNotSupported

properties.rdfs:comment: Operating systems supported (Windows 7, OSX 10.6, Android 1.6).
properties.rdfs:label: operatingSystem

properties.rdfs:comment: Size of the application / package (e.g. 18MB). In the absence of a unit (MB, KB etc.), KB will be assumed.
properties.rdfs:label: fileSize

properties.rdfs:comment: URL at which the app may be installed, if different from the URL of the item.
properties.rdfs:label: installUrl
